originalText.text:
My experience was phenomenal. I called Luis the sales rep First who was very helpful and gave me all the info I asked for then I received call back from Andrew the owner who met with me on Monday the day I was buying my bike.
They were very helpful, clear and enthusiastic about bikes. I am still doing business with them and will recommend this dealership to everyone who wants to get a new bike.
I bought the Dorsoduro900 2018 and I am very happy. Thank you!!!

originalText.text: I recently purchased a new sport bike from Aprilia of Manhattan.  I didn't originally have the intention of buying a motorcycle from Luis (my sales guy), I was stopping by the shop to see the RSV4 in person as none of the dealers in the area I live carry Aprilia.  The first time I came in the team was super friendly, and didn't give me a hard time for coming in without any intention of buying anything.  Over the next several months I zeroed in on the RSV4 as the bike that was for me, and continued to communicate with Luis and the team over at Aprilia of Manhattan about my interest in purchasing.  I found several groups that made a more aggressive offer on the bikes, but when it was all said and done they had some kind of game they were trying to play, to then switch and come up with additional fees that I would have to eat.  Throughout out the process Luis and his team were very straightforward with me and never compromised their integrity in order to get me in to the dealership. Once I decided to move forward the process was a breeze they took great care of me, and I got to ride my new bike out of Manhattan on a beautiful Saturday.  I am really grateful and appreciative for all the hard work Luis and his team made to earn my business.  The next time I am looking for a bike I will definitely be going to Luis and the team over at Aprilia of Manhattan first.

originalText.text:
I just bought my Vespa GTS300!
5 Stars is not enough to describe the great experience that I had at Vespa Manhattan Store. Luis has been really professional and helpful during my decision. I totally suggest Luis and Vespa Manhattan/Brooklyn Team! Gaetano

originalText.text: As I reached 600 miles in my Vespa, I feel like it's a good time to share how much fun has been driving around town.

text.text: As I reached 600 miles in my Vespa, I feel like it's a good time to share how much fun has been driving around town.

originalText.text: These folks went above and beyond for me, always. I was hit by a cab right after picking up my beautiful Guzzi. Andrew stuck by me that day and throughout the process of getting back in the road. I'm only buying motorcycles from this family owned business. Great people!
